articles.author: Rappler Research Team
articles.title: LIST: Southeast Asian winners of the Nobel Peace Prize - Rappler
articles.description: Rappler CEO Maria Ressa is the latest addition to the Southeast Asian list, recognized for her efforts in championing press freedom in the Philippines.
articles.content: In June 2020, Ressa was convicted of cyber libel together with former researcher Reynaldo Santos Jr. This is one of at least seven active cases pending in court against Rappler, as of August 10, 2021… [+86 chars]

articles.title: Mukesh Ambani joins $100 billion club among world's richest Bezos, Musk - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Asia’s richest man Mukesh Ambani has joined Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk in the exclusive $100 billion club as Reliance stocks skyrocketed on Friday.
articles.content:
Mukesh Ambani, Asias richest person, joined Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk in the worlds most exclusive wealth club with a fortune of at least $100 billion.

articles.title: Singapore, South Korea to allow quarantine-free travel from Nov 15 for those vaccinated - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): People vaccinated against Covid-19 will be able to travel between Singapore and South Korea without quarantine from Nov 15.
articles.content:
